repository.corpname: James G. Leyburn Library, Special Collections and Archives

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials from Washington & Lee University's Special Collections are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study, pursuant to U.S. Copyright law. The user assumes full responsibility for any use of the materials, including but not limited to, infringement of copyright and publication rights of reproduced materials. Any materials used should be fully credited with the source.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Benjamin Borden Land Grant, WLU Coll. 0107, Special Collections and Archives, James G. Leyburn Library, Washington and Lee University, Lexington, VA.
In some cases the citation format may vary. Please contact Special Collections' staff to verify the appropriate format.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of one document, the original land grant to Benjamin Borden of a tract of land for settlement in what would become Rockbridge County.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Materials regarding the acquisition of this document from the Boyer family are located in Record Group 3 (Treasurer's Office), Series 1, Box 1 under the title of Borden Grant.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research use.
